Simon Brebeck

    Method
    Description
    boolean
    exists(Bucket bucket, String parentPath, String folder)
    Checks if a StorageFolder with the name folder exists in a bucket and a path.

    Returns an optional containing the StorageFolder with the name from a bucket and a path, if it exists.

  • Method Details

    • findByPath

      Optional<StorageFolder> findByPath(Bucket bucket, Path path)
      Returns an optional containing the StorageFolder with the name from a bucket and a path, if it exists.
      Parameters:
      bucket - The bucket where the folder is located.
      path - The relative Path to the folder from the bucket.
      Returns:
      an optional containing the StorageFolder, if it exists.
      See Also:
      • Bucket
      • StorageFolder

    • exists

      boolean exists(Bucket bucket, String parentPath, String folder)
      Checks if a StorageFolder with the name folder exists in a bucket and a path.
      Parameters:
      bucket - The bucket where the folder is located.
      parentPath - The relative path to the folder from the bucket.
      folder - The name of the folder.
      Returns:
      true if the folder exists, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      • Bucket

    • getFolderByPath

      StorageFolder getFolderByPath(Bucket bucket, Path folderPath)
      Returns the StorageFolder with the name from a bucket and a path, if it exists.
      Parameters:
      bucket - The bucket where the folder is located.
      folderPath - The relative path to the folder from the bucket.
      Returns:
      the StorageFolder, if it exists.
      See Also:
      • Bucket
      • StorageFolder

    • getFolderIfNotBucketElseNull

      StorageFolder getFolderIfNotBucketElseNull(Bucket bucket, Path path)
      Get the StorageFolder with the name from a bucket and a path, if it exists.
      Parameters:
      bucket - The bucket to search in
      path - The path to search for
      Returns:
      The StorageFolder if it exists, else null
      See Also:
      • Bucket
